name: Twisty Road! ...
description:
Twisty Road is all about perfect timing and accuracy. Immerse yourself in this thrilling journey with rich stunning visuals on path. Weave between the circular platforms and tap perfectly to charge up. As you progress further, the speed becomes insane making it more challenging and worthwhile to play

How to play :

• Tap when the ball reaches the circular platform
• If you tap earlier before the ball reaches platform - player dies
• If you tap later after the ball passed over the platform - player dies

It’s very simple yet addictive. Go for it and have fun
